data.title: Pejabat Pengarah Urusan – YAYASAN USAHA MAJU
data.text:
Perutusan Pengarah Urusan YUM

Muhammad Yunus http://muhammadyunus.org/

Brian Tracy http://www.briantracy.com/

Pejabat Setiausaha Kerajaan Negeri (SKN) Sabah http://www.skn.sabah.gov.my/

Pejabat Ketua Setiausaha Negara (KSN) http://www.pmo.gov.my/ksn/home.php?

Wanita dalam Pembangunan (KPWKM) http://www.kpwkm.gov.my/

“quotes”

Poverty is not created by the poor. Nor it is sustained by them. The roots of poverty can be found in our institutions, concepts, and theoretical frameworks. ~Prof Muhammad Yunus

Credit should be taken as a human right. Only then can other human rights be really established – right to food, right to shelter, right to education, and right to health. ~Prof Muhammad Yunus

Microcredit is about much more than access to money. It is about women gaining control over the means to make a living. It is about women lifting themselves out of poverty and vulnerability. It is about women achieving economic and political empowerment within their homes, their villages, and their countries. ~ Noeleen Heyzer
